channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6879, MT6895, MT6983, MT8791, MT8791T, MT8797
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6879, MT6895, MT6983, MT8791, MT8791T, MT8797

item.title: CVE-2023-20641|2023-05-09T00:00:00 -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8791%2C%20mt8791t%2C%20mt8797
item.description: In ril, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07629574; Issue ID: ALPS07629574.

item.title: CVE-2023-20640|2023-05-09T00:00:00 -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6879%2C%20mt6895%2C%20mt6983%2C%20mt8791%2C%20mt8791t%2C%20mt8797
item.description: In ril, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07629573; Issue ID: ALPS07629573.
